name: Rockman 7 EP
overview: Rockman 7 EP is a complete romhack of Rockman 7 (NOT Mega Man 7). Expect all new (and some familiar) level designs, mid-boss battles, auto-scrolling sections, shop items, enemy and Robot Master attack patterns, weapon behaviors, and a lot more. It also enables in-game switching of weapons and adaptor. Apply patch to Rockman 7 (Japanese version) with No Header, NOT Mega Man 7 (USA version).
